name: Spatron Bot
description:
This was made for the 76th Mini Jam. The limitation was "One handed controlls".  Try to kill as many enemies as possible, but your bullets leave a deadly zone of radiation behind.

-CONTROLLLS-

Move - Move your mouse.

Shoot - Left click.

Rotate - Scroll the scroll bar.

Turn 180 - Right click

Turn 90 - Mouse 4( One of the side buttons)

To get the full game experience please enter full screen.
